response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's only fair to offer it at a price that reflects its true worth. We kindly propose a transaction price of $950,000. This figure encapsulates the product's exceptional quality and the benefits it will bring to you. We look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
